description: This file defines an AuthProvider class for managing user authentication state and handling JWT-based API calls in a Flutter application. It includes methods for login, registration, and logout, interacting with a network helper and decoding JWT tokens.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: Handles user authentication state using ChangeNotifier, manages JWT tokens, and provides login, registration, and logout functionalities.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Updates the loading state and notifies listeners.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts to authenticate a user with given credentials, stores JWT token and username on success.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user and logs in upon success.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Resets authentication state and notifies listeners.
